entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
